Flag indication whether the EVENT.TYPE should have a fiscal effect. Fiscal effect is the removal of securities from the CG transaction base at market valuation as specified in the CG.TXN.RULES record, potentially generating a capital gain or loss.
Only used with EVENT.TYPE MERGER and SPINOFF.
Used to indicate the lowest market value of the old security or new security/securities is to be used when calculating the resultant costs from a MERGER event.
Only used with EVENT.TYPE MERGER when FISCAL.EFF = Y
Used to indicate the market value of the old security is to be used when calculating the resultant costs from a MERGER event.
Only used with EVENT.TYPE MERGER when FISCAL.EFF = Y.
Used to indicate whether the cash fraction value from the corporate action should be used to adjust the costs of the transaction base on which the corporate action has acted.
The EVENT.TYPE specifies the rules which a transaction will follow.
A flag indicating whether the update to CG.TXN.BASE will be made with the transaction (ONLINE) or as part of an End of Day batch process (BATCH).

The key to the CG.TXN.RULES. Consists of 3 parts, the TRANSACTION.NAME, the SUB.ASSET.TYPE and the SECURITY.ID. Allows the same TRANSACTION.NAME to operate under different rules for various SUB.ASSET.TYPE's or SECURITY.ID's if required.
TRANSACTION.NAME is mandatory and must be an entry in SC.TRANS.NAME.
SUB.ASSET.TYPE is optional but if entered must be an entry in SUB.ASSET.TYPE.
SECURTY.ID is option but if entered must be an entry in SECURITY.MASTER.
Both SUB.ASSET.TYPE and SECURITY.ID cannot be used together.
TRANSACTION.NAME may be used on its own or in conjuction with either SUB.ASSET.TYPE or SECURITY.ID.
Flag indication whether the EVENT.TYPE should update the original nominal values.
Only used with EVENT.TYPE CAPINCR.RIGHTS, BONUS and STOCK.DIVIDEND.
Used to indicate the market value of the new security/securities is to be used when calculating the resultant costs from a MERGER or STOCK.DIVIDEND event.
Only used with EVENT.TYPE MERGER when FISCAL.EFF = Y and STOCK.DIVIDEND.
Flag indication whether the EVENT.TYPE should use the original acquisition dates when creating new base records derived from the original records.
Used only with EVENT.TYPE CAPINCR.RIGHTS, BONUS and STOCK.DIVIDEND.
A Yes or No flag indicating whether capital gains tax should be calculated for a transaction with this rule.
Used to indicate whether the accrued interest should be included in any Capital gains tax calculations.
Used to indicate whether the conversion premium should be included in any Capital gains tax calculations.
